name: Fly to the Moon
description:
Space = Jump, A = Left, D = Right.

Inspired by a classic Chinese ancient legend - Chang E's fly to the moon. 

The day she flew to the moon is the middle of August in Lunar Calendar, people then  celebrate this day as Mid-autumn Festival while there is a full moon, and reunion with their families and friends. 

It is almost the time of the year, I hope this game brings everyone a little of joyfulness :)
